name: My First Website
description: My first attempt to create a static website. Check your BMI, get paid in Bitcoin & FoldingCoin and learn how you can easily help scientific research.

name: My Address Book
description: After a week's learning of JavaScript, this was the result. Pair programed with my fellow student Stefan.

name: FizzBuzz Game
description: A simple weekend project. The famous FizzBuzz game!

name: Library Challenge
description: Library management where the database is stored in a YAML file. Pair programed with my fellow student Zane. Run via IRB.

name: ATM Challenge
description: Deposit and withdraw money at an ATM. Pair programed with my fellow student Zane. Run via IRB

name: Paper Rock Scissors Game
description: Another famous game. Simple & lightweight design. Player VS computer and player VS player modes. Please view the README file for information about the styling.

name: My First Rails App
description: A simple blog build on Rails. Ability to comment on published articles. CRUD functionality. User and admin authentication.

name: Cat-BnB
description: Getting your cat the attention it deserves! An AirBNB for cats. Pair programmed with all my fellow students. 75% test coverage. Used Semaphore for CI.

name: Cooper Calculator
description: The famous Cooper test. Back-end API built on rails and hosted on Heroku. Styled using Semantic UI for React. Pair programmed with my fellow student Felix.

name: Glocal News
description: News for everyone, by anyone, from everywhere! A peer-to-peer review online newspaper. Pair programmed with all my fellow students.
